title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Overcoming Quadrilateral Learning Disabilities and Fostering Mathematical Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Identify at least three major misconceptions (e.g., failure to recognize that the sum of interior angles in all quadrilaterals is 360 degrees) that occur during quadrilateral learning
Design at least two instructional strategies that promote mathematical creativity through puzzle-based activities
Analyze cognitive barriers encountered when proving properties of specific quadrilaterals (e.g., trapezoids, parallelograms)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
